meanings.sent1: My ecos is a cozy place where I feel safe and warm.
meanings.sent2: The ecos of the squirrel was nestled in the tree trunk.
meanings.sent3: The ecos of the ant was a tiny leaf that he called home.
meanings.sent4: The ecos of the bird was a sturdy nest high up in the tree.
meanings.sent5: The ecos of the rabbit was a burrow underground, hidden from predators.

meanings.sent1: The forest provides a rich ecos for many different animals.
meanings.sent2: The ecos of the fish is the clear waters of the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The ecos of the polar bear is the icy Arctic, where it feels at home.
meanings.sent4: The ecos of the lion is the vast savannah, where it roams freely.
meanings.sent5: The ecos of the butterfly is the colorful garden, filled with nectar-rich flowers.
